body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. computer playes bladed pinions artifact
2. computer has 2 or more creatures 
3. it is the computers turn What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expect the computer will attach bladed pinions and attack. Compute cycles through all creatures attaching bladed pinions until it runs out of mana. Will equip tapped creatures as well as creatures it has already attached it to. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.18 Please provide any additional information below. Great work!
